00027 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00028 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00029 #include "LinearTetrahedron.hpp"
00030 
00031 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00032 
00033 static const char* nonlinear_error 
00034  = "Attempt to use LinearTetrahedron mapping function for a nonlinear element\n";
00035  
00036 EntityTopology LinearTetrahedron::element_topology() const
00037   { return TETRAHEDRON; }
00038   
00039 int LinearTetrahedron::num_nodes() const
00040   { return 4; }
00041 
00042 NodeSet LinearTetrahedron::sample_points( NodeSet ) const
00043 {
00044   NodeSet result;
00045   result.set_mid_region_node();
00046   return result;
00047 }
00048 
00049 static const unsigned faces[][3] = { { 1, 0, 3 },
00050                                      { 3, 2, 1 },
00051                                      { 0, 2, 3 },
00052                                      { 0, 1, 2 } };
00053 
00054 void LinearTetrahedron::coefficients( Sample location,
00055                                       NodeSet nodeset,
00056                                       double* coeff_out,
00057                                       size_t* indices_out,
00058                                       size_t& num_coeff,
00059                                       MsqError& err ) const
00060 {
00061   if (nodeset.have_any_mid_node()) {
00062     MSQ_SETERR(err)(nonlinear_error, MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00063     return;
00064   }
00065   
00066   switch (location.dimension) {
00067     case 0:
00068       num_coeff = 1;
00069       indices_out[0] = location.number;
00070       coeff_out[0] = 1.0;
00071       break;
00072     case 1:
00073       num_coeff = 2;
00074       coeff_out[0] = 0.5;
00075       coeff_out[1] = 0.5;
00076       if (location.number < 3) {
00077         indices_out[0] = location.number;
00078         indices_out[1] = (location.number+1)%3;
00079       }
00080       else {
00081         indices_out[0] = location.number - 3;
00082         indices_out[1] = 3;
00083       }
00084       break;
00085     case 2:
00086       num_coeff = 3;
00087       indices_out[0] = faces[location.number][0];
00088       indices_out[1] = faces[location.number][1];
00089       indices_out[2] = faces[location.number][2];
00090       coeff_out[0] = coeff_out[1] = coeff_out[2] = coeff_out[3] = MSQ_ONE_THIRD;
00091       break;
00092     case 3:
00093       num_coeff = 4;
00094       indices_out[0] = 0;
00095       indices_out[1] = 1;
00096       indices_out[2] = 2;
00097       indices_out[3] = 3;
00098       coeff_out[0] = coeff_out[1] = coeff_out[2] = coeff_out[3] = 0.25;
00099       break;
00100     default:
00101       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid/unsupported logical dimension",MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00102   }
00103 }
00104 
00105 void LinearTetrahedron::derivatives( Sample ,
00106                                      NodeSet nodeset,
00107                                      size_t* vertices,
00108                                      MsqVector<3>* coeff_derivs,
00109                                      size_t& num_vtx,
00110                                      MsqError& err ) const
00111 {
00112   if (nodeset.have_any_mid_node()) {
00113     MSQ_SETERR(err)(nonlinear_error, MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00114     return;
00115   }
00116   else {
00117     num_vtx = 4;
00118     vertices[0] = 0;
00119     vertices[1] = 1;
00120     vertices[2] = 2;
00121     vertices[3] = 3;
00122     
00123     coeff_derivs[0][0] = -1.0;
00124     coeff_derivs[0][1] = -1.0;
00125     coeff_derivs[0][2] = -1.0;
00126 
00127     coeff_derivs[1][0] =  1.0;
00128     coeff_derivs[1][1] =  0.0;
00129     coeff_derivs[1][2] =  0.0;
00130 
00131     coeff_derivs[2][0] =  0.0;
00132     coeff_derivs[2][1] =  1.0;
00133     coeff_derivs[2][2] =  0.0;
00134 
00135     coeff_derivs[3][0] =  0.0;
00136     coeff_derivs[3][1] =  0.0;
00137     coeff_derivs[3][2] =  1.0;
00138   }
00139 }
00140 
00141 void LinearTetrahedron::ideal( Sample , 
00142                                MsqMatrix<3,3>& J,
00143                                MsqError&  ) const
00144 {
00145   const double a = 1.122462048309373;  // 6th root of 2
00146   const double b = 1.7320508075688772; // sqrt(3)
00147   const double c = 1.5874010519681994; // 2 to the 2/3
00148   J(0,0) = a;   J(0,1) = 0.5*a;   J(0,2) = 0.5*a;
00149   J(1,0) = 0.0; J(1,1) = 0.5*a*b; J(1,2) = 0.5*a/b;
00150   J(2,0) = 0.0; J(2,1) = 0.0;     J(2,2) = c/b;
00151 }
00152
